name: Hidden Shapes Black Skull - Jigsaw Puzzle Game
name_original: Hidden Shapes Black Skull - Jigsaw Puzzle Game
description:
Disconnect yourself from the world with this game and its beautiful art, inspired by the world of Pirates, created especially for you to relax, be inspired and have fun!
Be amazed by the minimalist style and the fine art of this game!

So that you can have fun and enjoy the game more, after solving a puzzle the complete art will be released, so at any time you can have fun again solving the entire puzzle.

- Steam Community

Do not forget to follow us to know the news of this game and others!
